content.webTitle: Pick of the Week: South: Comedy

fields.headline: Pick of the week: Comedy
fields.bodyText: Gaymers Cider Camden Crawl Various venues, London, Sat 25 Apr The sprawling music festival also hosts comedy, featuring Pappy's Fun Club, Isy Suttie and Jack Whitehall. Check thecamdencrawl.com for full details. Stephen Carlin Jesters, Bristol, Sat 25 Apr; Queens Park Arts Centre, Aylesbury, Fri 1 May Having toured with Stephen Merchant and Stewart Lee, great things are expected of this Edinburgh-born snooker-obsessed stand-up. Ginger And Black Komedia, Brighton, Thu 30 Apr Eri Jackson (Ginger) and Daniel Taylor (Black) are a talented musical duo specialising in songs mocking the more vapid side of 21st-century life.
